https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dp6kBcSD0pbrHX5oiY3ZC2VwEa6.jpg Freelance writer Shigemi Ichikawa (Goro Inagaki) knows that he is having an affair with a popular novelist whom his editor wife Sae (Yuri Nakamura) is in charge of. But he couldn't tell his wife. He was also troubled by certain feelings that arose in him when he found out about his cheating. One day, at a certain literary award ceremony, Ichikawa was attracted to the content of the award-winning novel "La France" by high school writer Ai Kubo (Tina Tamashiro). I ask. If he exists, I want him to meet me... By The Window
